Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1

Hi,

If you are leaving the default modules in use, the the ARCWriter is being
used which means the crawled stuff are being compressed into .arc files and
stored in /thePathToYourHeritrix/jobs/theNameYouGaveToTheJob/arcs

There are special readers for the compressed ARC files and you can know more
about them by looking at section on ARCWriter in the developer manual.

An easier appraoch is to change the settings of the crawl job (by clicking
"modules") and choosing the Mirror writer instead of the ARCWriter (add the
mirrors writer and remove the arc writer). The results of the crawl will be
 files in .../jobs/JobName/mirror. Those are files you can open with your
browser.

Anas

--0016e659f6e4bab3550479e85b44
Content-Type: text/html; charset=ISO-8859-1
